public class EnvironmentConfigAPI

extends model.Object

API to Environment Config. Use to leverage some of EC internal methods in your application

Method Detail

createBeanFromStruct

public struct createBeanFromStruct(struct properties, [string path='/'], [string setterAccess='public'])
Creates a ColdFusion Clas (CFC) from a struct of properties

Parameters:
properties - A Structure of properties. Getters and Setters will be generated based off these properties
path - Relative path where the CFC will be written to. If not provided the CFC will be written to the root of your site
setterAccess - The Access type for all set methods. Values accepted are 'Public','Package' or 'Private'. If not provided it defaults to Public

createColdSpringConfigFile

public struct createColdSpringConfigFile(string csFilePath, string beanFilePath, struct properties)
Creates the ColdSpring config file for a bean from a struct of properties

Parameters:
csFilePath
beanFilePath
properties
